table_name: Selected Social Characteristics in the United States (Profile)

columns.name: high_school_graduate_or_higher
columns.description: Number of persons 25 years and over with at least a high‑school diploma

columns.name: bachelors_degree_or_higher
columns.description: Number of persons 25 years and over with a bachelor’s degree or higher

sql_ddl:
CREATE TABLE dp02 (
  geography_id VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  year INTEGER NOT NULL,
  high_school_graduate_or_higher INTEGER,
  high_school_graduate_or_higher_moe INTEGER,
  bachelors_degree_or_higher INTEGER,
  bachelors_degree_or_higher_moe INTEGER,
  civilian_population_18_over INTEGER,
  civilian_veterans INTEGER,
  PRIMARY KEY (geography_id, year)
);

high_school_graduate_or_higher.description: Number of persons 25 years and over with at least a high‑school diploma

bachelors_degree_or_higher.description: Number of persons 25 years and over with a bachelor’s degree or higher
